name: The Curse (Demo)
description:
"The Curse" is planned to be an emotional, dark, mysterious puzzle and adventure game based on the story of two main characters as well as their memories. This is just a demo version including just a short part of the game since the project is still in development. I plan to finish this game but I do not have a release date in mind so I do not know how long it will take to release the full game. Please feel free to comment your thoughts, criticism, suggestions etc. 

Credits are given in the game files.
